name: Magiczna Księga
overview: Magiczna Ksiega is a platform game, developed by Midnight Computer Games and published by Mirage Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1994. Nice story, nice graphics and animation, lacking in action. Written in AMOS. Game scenario & coding by Pawe? Miko?ajczak. Graphics by Adam Karol and Pawe? Miko?ajczak. Music by Robert Chojnacki and Krzysztof Sobiera?ski.
